title: Citroën C3 Picasso
summary: The Citroën C3 Picasso is a five-door mini MPV produced by the French motor company Citroën from 2008–2017. It was first unveiled at the 2008 Paris Motor Show as a concept car named "Drooneel".[9] The Picasso is the mini MPV version of the Citroën C3 and the successor of the Citroën Xsara Picasso, and was designed to compete with the Opel Meriva, Nissan Note,[10] Renault Modus and Ford Fusion.[11]
